content:
Polling a Subscription

    POLL http://server/resource HTTP/1.1
    Man: http://www.iana.org/http/gena
    Subscription-Type: update
    Subscription-ID: ABADCAFE
    Delivery-Control: poll-interval=60;
    batch-mode=multipart/related
    HTTP/1.1 200 Ok
    Extended-Response: 20043 ;
    comment=“Events Pending”
    Content-Type: multipart/related
    Delivery-Control: poll-interval=60;
    batch-mode=multipart/related
